name: popup_content
label: Popup Content
default:
We’re in Beta

Functionly is currently featured rapid new feature sets and is in beta phase. We expect to have a full launched product out of beta by February 2021

children.name: content
children.label: Price Details Content
children.default:
Key features:

  • Unlimited org size
  • Access all libraries
  • Quickly redesign your org
  • Functional org charts

Account security:

  • SSO - Secure logins
  • SSL - Encrypted at transit & rest
  • Secure data centres
  • GDPR compliant

Easily import people:

  • People data import (CSV, HRIS)
  • Import from slack
  • More integrations coming soon

Org change exports:

  • Export org charts
  • Export job descriptions
  • Job descriptions
  • Team allocations

Ongoing support:

  • Email support
  • Self onboarding
  • Assisted onboarding
  • Assigned success manager
